about.title: About me
about.paragraph1: I am passionate about web development and have reinvented myself in this field. I love creating digital experiences that are functional, intuitive, and truly add value to users. To achieve this, I have built a strong foundation in technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, MongoDB, PHP, and Java, as well as frameworks like Angular, React, and Laravel. Throughout my training and personal projects, I have developed complete web applications, with special attention to user experience and optimization, applying UI/UX principles. One of my favorite projects was developing a Laravel API for accommodation bookings, which you can check out on my GitHub.
about.paragraph2: I'm not specialized in any one stack yet because I enjoy exploring everything web development offers and I'm eager to learn. I might find my focus in the future, but for now, I prefer to keep an open mind about any technology or knowledge since there's so much to discover and use in the world of development.
about.paragraph3: Before dedicating myself to development, I worked in customer service and process analysis, which helped me better understand the real needs of users and bring an analytical approach to my projects. Now, I am seeking my first professional challenge in web development, eager to contribute what I know, keep learning, and grow in a collaborative environment where continuous improvement is part of everyday work.
